Deficiency Narrative: Operation failed to report quarterly EBI numbers for 1st quarter January-March 2025.
Correction Narrative: To ensure EBI is reported in a timely manner, the Administrator is setting a calendar reminder at the last week of every quarter to ensure it is done. She will also be leaving a little sticky note on the  computer that is highlighted for the reminder.

Deficiency Narrative: During walk through of facility inspector counted medication of all children in care. 4 out of 6 children count was incorrect. The count showed the number of dose of medication and not the number of pills left in the pack.
Correction Narrative: Inspector received an email from Carley Campbell. The operation completed a training with all staff and discussed with their pharmacy on how to correctly properly package medcation for pill counts

Deficiency Narrative: 1 of 4 staff records reviewed had not completed annual normalcy training within the year.
Correction Narrative:
The operation stated:
Our HR department does a great job of keeping track of general trainings that are required upon hire, and those that are due to be renewed annually. Our plan moving forward is to set calendar reminders to review all active staff trainings at the local level to ensure each staff member is notified of their upcoming training requirements ahead of time and to ensure continued compliance with minimum standards. These trainings will be kept in a shared folder for our Program Director, Milieu Manager, and LCCA to access.  The Program Manager will be in charge of ensuring staff trainings are complete.
We reached out to this employee multiple ways since 12/18 however due to their part time status and the holiday, we were delayed in making a connection.  Staff completed training on 12/24/2020.  Please see attached training verification document.
Training certificates attached.

Deficiency Narrative: There was no discipline policy for the agency.
Correction Narrative:
The operation stated:
An Amendment to Center for Discovery Residential Treatment Consents has been sent for review by internal QA team to include review of discipline policy and behavior intervention. Anticipated date of implementation is 1/15/21.

Please see the attached attestation document that will be included in our patient and parent welcome packets as of 1/15/2021. 

Attestation was attached

Deficiency Narrative: The operation failed to notify their Licensing Rep of changes to the controlling person's for the organization.
Correction Narrative:
The operation stated the following:
To ensure that this type of deficiency does not happen again Discovery Practice Management's process is as follows:
 
The CSQM/Administrative team will submit the required documentation (form 2760) as well as notify licensing as soon as possible, but no later than 30 calendar days prior to: 
    A change in the legal structure of our operation or our governing body. 

The CSQM/Administrative team will submit the required documentation (form 2760) as well as notify licensing as soon as possible, but no later than two days after:
a) A new individual becomes a controlling person at our operation;b) An individual ceases to be a controlling person at our operation; orc) There is a significant change in the information we maintain about a controlling person, such as a name change or mailing address change
This practice will be in effect immediately
